# Cancelled Tender Notice EA003-230682/A ### Tender Information | **Category** | **Information** | **French Equivalent** | | --- | --- | --- | | Tender Reference | PW="_PWD-003-7851" | Numéro de référence de l'appel d'offres : PW="_PWD-003-7851" | | Solicitation Number | EA003-230682/A | Numéro de sollicitation : EA003-230682/A | | Tender Status | Cancelled | Annulé | | GSIN Classification | 5133C - Waterways, Harbours, Dams and Other Water Works | Classification NIBS : 5133C - Voies de navigation, ports, barrages et autres adductions d'eau | ### Tender Details * This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a competitive open bidding process. * The procurement category is Classified Non-Strategic Threshold (CNST). * The notice type is a Request for Proposal (RFP). * The expected regions of opportunity for this tender are Newfoundland and Labrador. * The expected regions of delivery for this tender are Newfoundland and Labrador. * The contracting entity is Public Works and Government Services Canada. * The end user entities are also Public Works and Government Services Canada. * The notice has been cancelled and there are no attachments provided. ### Contact Information * Contact Person: Adam Beaumaster * Email Address: [adam.beaumaster@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:adam.beaumaster@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca) * Phone Number: (709) 330-7142 * Fax Number: (709) 772-4603 * Address: John Cabot Building
10 Barters Hill, P.O.
